channel.title: My Awesome fddl Site
channel.description: A retro-modern website built with fddl

item.title: fddl
item.description: A high-performance static site generator written in Swift.

item.title: Swift-Powered Site Generation: The Technical Foundation
item.description: Exploring why Swift is an excellent choice for building a static site generator and the key dependencies that power fddl.

item.title: fddl Features: Shortcodes, Plugins, and More
item.description: A comprehensive look at fddl's features including shortcodes, plugins, the dev server, and the template system.

item.title: Introducing fddl: A Swift-Powered Static Site Generator
item.description: Meet fddl, a markdown-based static site generator built with Swift as a learning journey with NotebookLM.
